page.title: 12The Media in Manchester
page.content: Manchester is the major newspaper publishing area outside Manchester. The Guardian is just one of the national papers published and printed in Manchester, sharing presses with a very important regional evening paper called the Manchester Evening News. Radio, both local and the commercial one - Radio Piccadilly, rival the national Radio 1 and 2 for music, sport nad news. The BBC regularly broadcasts concerts from its Oxford Road studio and the Royal Exchange Theatre is used for Midday concerts. BBC Manchester and Granada TV supply the national networks with well devised programmes like Coronation Street and Brass Tacks.
